grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 冬眠【トウミン】hibernation, winter sleep, torpor
安眠【アンミン】sound sleep, good sleep, quiet sleep
kun reading compounds: 眠る【ねむる】to sleep (not necessarily lying down), to die, to lie idle (e.g. of resources), to be dormant, to be unused, to close one's eyes
